content: अवस्कंद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To attack, storm, assault; overpower, overwhelm; छायामप्यवस्कंदितुं <ls>Mv. 3</ls>; प्रभुरिव मामवस्कंदयितुं {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%} to attack or insult; पुरीमवरकंद लुनीहि नंदनं <ls>Śi. 1. 51</ls>; स्नेहावस्कन्नहृदया <ls>Rām.</ls> affected. {@--2@} To spring or leap down. {@--3@} To pour out.
